Perfect Being.quote: Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect. (Matthew 5:48)

Perfect Nature.quote: Allah - there is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Self-Sustaining. (Quran 2:255)

Perfect Knowledge.quote: That which is perfect knows all and comprehends all. (Vedanta Sutra 2.1.14)

Perfect Love.quote: Perfect love casts out fear. (1 John 4:18)

Perfect Unity.quote: In perfect Oneness, there is no separation between knower and known. (Upanishads)

Perfect Will.quote: The divine will is supremely and perfectly good. (Thomas Aquinas, Summa Theologica)

Perfect Power.quote: With God all things are possible. (Matthew 19:26)

Perfect Wisdom.quote: The Tao is perfect, lacking nothing. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 25)

Perfect Peace.quote: The peace of God, which surpasses all understanding. (Philippians 4:7)

Perfect Justice.quote: The Rock, His work is perfect, for all His ways are justice. (Deuteronomy 32:4)

Perfect Freedom.quote: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is perfect freedom. (2 Corinthians 3:17)

Perfect Beauty.quote: From Zion, perfect in beauty, God shines forth. (Psalm 50:2)

Perfect Truth.quote: That which is perfectly true remains unchanged. (Bhagavad Gita 2:16)

Perfect Bliss.quote: In the perfect state of Brahman, there is absolute bliss. (Mandukya Upanishad)

Perfect Harmony.quote: Heaven and Earth are in perfect harmony with the Tao. (Tao Te Ching, Chapter 32)

Perfect Light.quote: God is light, and in Him there is no darkness at all. (1 John 1:5)

Perfect Law.quote: The law of the Lord is perfect, refreshing the soul. (Psalm 19:7)

Perfect Creation.quote: And God saw everything that He had made, and behold, it was very good. (Genesis 1:31)

Perfect Grace.quote: My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness. (2 Corinthians 12:9)

Perfect Presence.quote: Where can I go from your Spirit? Where can I flee from your presence? (Psalm 139:7)

Perfect Guidance.quote: He guides to Himself those who turn to Him in penitence. (Quran 13:27)

Perfect Mercy.quote: The mercy of the Lord is perfect and eternal. (Psalm 136:1)

Perfect Glory.quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands. (Psalm 19:1)

Perfect Existence.quote: I am the eternal, perfect, absolute Being. (Bhagavad Gita 10:12)

Perfect Design.quote: How perfect are His works! All His ways are just. (Deuteronomy 32:4)
